ruling: - If you have only [[Kuriboh]] in your hand, and no Spell or Trap Cards on the field, and your [[Theban Nightmare]] battles with a card that has higher ATK/DEF, and you discard [[Kuriboh]], the ATK of [[Theban Nightmare]] is increased by 1500 AFTER damage calculation (but [[Theban Nightmare]] is still destroyed by damage calculation unless an effect like [[Waboku]] had been activated previously during the turn).
